Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I had breast cancer in 2008 and have been feeling fine until recently when I found a lump in my neck. I have had a biopsy and blood tests and waiting for the scans. I am terrified especially as 2 of my children are still young and one has autism. I feel despairing. I really need encouragement to fight. HELP
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Hi. The cancer has returned in the lymph nodes around the neck and in the sternum and unfortunately this time its triple negative. So far have had one of six planned cycles of docetaxol which is horrible anddoesn't seem to be having any effect on the neck lump so far. How long does it take to work?
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Thanks. I am finding it really hard at the moment. Good luck with your scans. As you say the waiting is terrible and also trying to function normally for your kids.
Posts.Title: SCARED
